UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Mauriporin, a Novel Cationic a-Helical Peptide with Selective Cytotoxic Activity Against Prostate Cancer Cell Lines from the Venom of the Scorpion Androctonus mauritanicus
Literature.Author: Almaaytah A, Tarazi S, Mhaidat N, Al-Balas Q, Mukattash TL

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and Antibioﬁlm Activity of Mauriporin, a Multifunctional Scorpion Venom Peptide
Literature.Author: Almaaytah A, Tarazi S, Alsheyab F, Al-Balas Q, Mukattash TL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Vero cells:IC50=59.7±0.13 µM,Human umbilical vein endothelial cells HUVEC:IC50=62.5±0.19 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:5.2% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:15.4% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=7.7±0.24µM),Human prostate cancer DU145(IC50=4.4±0.45µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma LNCaP(IC50=7.8±0.27µM),Listeria ivanovii ATCC 19119(MIC=5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=10µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis ATCC 10708(MIC=5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(IC50=7.5µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica ATCC 29629(MIC=7.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=10µM)
